answerText: Eugenie Grandet[10] Eugenie Grandet is a part of this French author's massive Human Comedy.

question: Question:  [10] Identify this novel set in the town of Saumur. Characters in this work include Cruchot and Nanon, the servant of the title woman, and it's part of a series that also included Pere Goriot.
